thread.section_title: Avas Flowers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Avas Flowers | avasflowers.com | 5 of 317
thread.title: SheilaAzzopardi

author: SheilaAzzopardi
title: SheilaAzzopardi
text: I ordered flowers from Avas Flowers in Conroe for my friends 60th birthday with a balloon. The flowers were delivered on time and the arrangement was as they promised with 24 long stemmed beautiful red roses in a red vase and the balloon was also as described in their web page. Thank you so much for being so efficient and timely and delivering what you promised. The arrangement was exactly how it was described on the webpage.
